org.apache.taverna.t2referencetest

Class GreenBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.t2referencetest.GreenBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>

    public class GreenBuilder
extends Object
implements ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>
    Trivially build a GreenReference from an InputStream, implementing the ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI interface. Used in the augmentation test cases.

    • Method Detail

      • createReference

        public GreenReference createReference(InputStream is,
                                      ReferenceContext context)
                               throws ExternalReferenceConstructionException
        Construct a new GreenReference from the given input stream, ignoring the otherwise helpful context as we don't need any resources from it. We assume UTF-8 encoding as that's what all the test reference types use, again, with a real example this might have to be a bit smarter!
        Specified by:
        createReference in interface ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>
        Parameters:
        is - the bytestream to read target from.
        context - a reference resolution context, needed potentially to construct the new ExternalReferenceSchemeSPI, especially in cases where the context contains security agents giving access to a remote data staging system *
        Returns:
        the newly constructed ExternalReferenceSPI instance.
        Throws:
        ExternalReferenceConstructionException - if there are any issues building the new GreenReference (which there won't be)

      • getConstructionCost

        public float getConstructionCost()
        Construction cost fixed at 1.5f
        Specified by:
        getConstructionCost in interface ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>
        Returns:
        1.5f

      • getReferenceType

        public Class<GreenReference> getReferenceType()
        Description copied from interface: ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI
        Expose the type of the ExternalReferenceSPI that this builder can construct
        Specified by:
        getReferenceType in interface ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>
        Returns:
        GreenReference.class

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled(ReferenceContext arg0)
        Doesn't use any context resources so is always enabled
        Specified by:
        isEnabled in interface ExternalReferenceBuilderSPI<GreenReference>
        Parameters:
        arg0 - the reference context that will be used to construct new references
        Returns:
        true
